Kachina-MDWhatsApp Bot Framework

Simple, Fast, and Modular framework for building WhatsApp bots

Get Started
View on GitHub
API Reference

Easy to Use

Simple and intuitive API designed for beginners and experts alike. Get started in minutes with just a few lines of code.

Lightning Fast

Built on top of Baileys with optimized performance. Handle thousands of messages efficiently.

Plugin System

Extend functionality with a powerful plugin system. Create and share custom commands easily.

Dual Authentication

Support for both QR Code and Pairing Code methods. Perfect for headless servers and Docker deployments.

Rich Features

Send text, images, videos, stickers, documents, polls, and more. Full WhatsApp feature support.

Sticker Creation

Built-in sticker maker with support for multiple formats - full, cropped, circle, and rounded.

View Once Reader

Read and download view once messages. Extract media from temporary messages.

Group Management

Complete group management API. Create groups, manage participants, update settings, and more.

Docker Ready

Production-ready with Docker support. Deploy anywhere with containerization.

TypeScript Support

Full TypeScript definitions included for better IDE support and type safety.

Auto Reconnect

Automatic reconnection handling. Your bot stays online even during network issues.

Comprehensive Docs

Detailed documentation with examples, tutorials, and API references. Everything you need to get started.

Quick Start ‚Äã

Installation ‚Äã

bash
npm install @roidev/kachina-md
1
bash
yarn add @roidev/kachina-md
1
bash
pnpm add @roidev/kachina-md
1

Basic Usage ‚Äã

javascript
import { Client } from '@roidev/kachina-md';

const client = new Client({
    sessionId: 'my-session',
    loginMethod: 'qr' // or 'pairing'
});

client.on('ready', (user) => {
    console.log('Bot is ready!', user.name);
});

client.on('message', async (message) => {
    if (message.body === '!ping') {
        await client.sendText(message.from, 'Pong! üèì');
    }
});

await client.start();

Why Kachina-MD? ‚Äã

üéØ Built for Developers ‚Äã

Kachina-MD provides a clean, modern API that makes building WhatsApp bots enjoyable. No more struggling with complex configurations or boilerplate code.

üöÄ Production Ready ‚Äã

Used in production by multiple projects. Handles thousands of messages daily with automatic reconnection and error recovery.

üåü Active Development ‚Äã

Regularly updated with new features, bug fixes, and improvements. Community-driven with responsive maintainers.

What's Included? ‚Äã

  • ‚úÖ Simple Setup - Get started in under 5 minutes
  • ‚úÖ QR & Pairing Auth - Choose your preferred login method
  • ‚úÖ Message Handling - Receive and send all message types
  • ‚úÖ Media Support - Images, videos, audio, documents
  • ‚úÖ Stickers - Create and send custom stickers
  • ‚úÖ Groups - Full group management capabilities
  • ‚úÖ Events - Rich event system for all WhatsApp events
  • ‚úÖ Plugins - Extensible plugin architecture
  • ‚úÖ TypeScript - Full type definitions included
  • ‚úÖ Docker - Container-ready for easy deployment
